verses.name: 1 Kings 4:31
verses.text: For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:32
verses.text: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:33
verses.text: And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.
